Class Producto

  • java.lang.Object
    • Producto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Producto>

    public class Producto
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Producto>

    Producto

    Producto class will have all the properties from the products for the sale Point.

    Note: This program doesn't have any validators, so exceptions could be thrown regullarly because of this.

    Since:
    2013
    See Also:
    Comparable

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Producto p)
        Method compare to that is used to compare two products by their key.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Producto>
        Parameters:
        p - It takes as a parameter the product that is going to be compared.
        Returns:
        int If the key is the same as the other product it will return 0, if it's bigger return -1 if not return 1.
